text: This is the BBC. This podcast is supported by advertising outside the UK. This Leicester Dolokhunsichy for BBC Radio Nengale. This is Leicester Dolokgyunsich from BBC Radio Nongale. Now, Leicester Dolok Geoffie, Learine Makh, Leigh This is the year 8 in the Keith. I'm the kinshe gave Mue Nose and Brede on the Wondertails from Scottish Myth and Legend with Dahl Alastair Makhannich. Be Inoos Mack the Caliher Beirah Beirah Outsch Yves'I Yonahue of Fati Yonour Makhk the Caliher Beira. Chakig Ush it or the furrach, fat a year on the Nielan Oeanye in the ear for not chik shew'n-oosh in Dune. Chonick in Ours Bredge on the Ashling, in the Toshach. Vreanee in Nielan Oannia as Jain. Hors'an Rhee? In the same, It's the one of the one of theenewan, Mujian, Hoursedan, Rhee, it's a bridge of chunico. When it's hick in saueric, be, Rida Hove as the Vahnui in taur on the quack the Echie in Echie, Chauphata in Surin, chaliki lehatt to go fash to the Pridde. Fannus in this Guse, that I'm the Flourichan the chien in Arstah. I'm going a lot of bridge in drasthe, ars and oz and fulch a-, Ricker, Enry, chanelah imachy. Cuner me gist to the wood and in chir, hoot, hoarse in oz I've me three law i'ersetsch from Loonestol to the Eulch. Reign of that, and there three law Alinachke, which is she amfulch a vaughan. Chlech inoos the leichin-shin in the lachin'erichin'er in Lorok. Charrot's serfichel and hiehidja. Better do inus Chilagachy. Saan, when it was flurichen a nirich in narchagug Better do inus chilegacky. So when it was flurichen in Yerich, a yearchug, a yearchews aryhth. In this, it was syrivichel. Lurak of bridge on the chastel for the rui in Braidiness. For this a mach the one of this, as a bridge, arse in use. And that's the law in the Gael a corachach haste, as a head law generally. Hanig Shikin on the Fartier to Chut E. Bidde. Chou'd Bain in the Chikin gess at Bred. Gaharichie in the utuch of order, the chorce of bonassela. Be a bickon Braidya, a heard ean, a chud farce in it, to hud farce, hushed a varri. Fartier in Brede. Hust the Vahari that big the one then an Nourshan Aenech and Ean Bredge. And, in the Chletach was a Feet Wara a Shein Leathalach In this there is Elling on this as in this as in Bredjan or Kille Brede Feelea. Fah's in Noos was euloch in the nigh-shea, m'eridgean, or kili-brize. Fahs, and bridge on the lucherst barry in the sheikhin. Vanitune and the hen-wean tullick, but charo a chalach-ver t'er, when I chunick a fere a fa'as was in cooch o'er other. tolitcher. When I chunnici, Am Fierre Fas, was an cooach o'er. There's a-too a chalik. Leme a chalach in munich and yeach rie a-oose Lorok, but heh o'nose and bribed. Ketea a charach in ch'erach Eichich Gughan Gugan, and bridge. Kete of the Charrach Ircheon chruik a chalach gughan and big colus a year to a yearn-hast. The toshach was a netack. There clachan, the kush, very three law, chay-kirik, and o'an a verag to the knowach. A-noche a gopach there's a gop-e one, a gopach in the hool-erut. Very Nye-Lah. A-Nosan was an scuapac a-an. It's a GON der Repi Keiken Farnan-N-Kin-Cruve. But, an devuany a I'm. It was a good Cholatier scund the Repi Keikin'an Coove, but in the Woonich Veerahlech Ver, hithin, not the churice my crue in the story in this
